Class: ClosureCompiler

ClosureCompiler

Closure Compiler binding.

new ClosureCompiler(options)

Constructs a new ClosureCompiler instance.

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
options Object.<string,*> <optional>

Compilation options

Members

<static> JAVA_EXT :string

Java extension, e.g. '.exe' on windows.

options :Object.<string, *>

Compilation options.

Methods

<static> compile(files, options, callback)

Compiles one or more scripts through a new instance of ClosureCompiler.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
files string | Array.<string>

File or an array of files to compile
options Object.<string,* | Array>

Any options Closure Compiler supports. If an option can occur multiple times, simply supply an array. Externs can additionally point to a directory to include all *.js files in it.
callback function(Error,string)

Callback called with the error, if any, and the compiled code
Throws:
If the file cannot be compiled
Type
Error

<static> getBundledJava() → {string}

Gets the path of the bundled java executable.

Returns:

Absolute path to "java(.exe)"

Type
string

<static> getGlobalJava() → {string}

Gets the path of the global java executable.

Returns:

Absolute path to or "java(.exe)" if not determinable

Type
string

<static> testJava(java, callback)

Tests if java is callable.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
java string

Path to java
callback function(boolean, Error)

Callback function

compile(files, callback)

Compiles one or more scripts through this instance of ClosureCompiler.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
files string | Array.<string>

File or an array of files to compile
callback function((Error | string),string)

Callback called with the error, if any, and the compiled code. If no error occurred, error contains the string output from stderr besides the result.
Throws:
If the file cannot be compiled
Type
Error

toString() → {string}

Returns a string representation of this object.

Returns:

String representation as of "ClosureCompiler"

Type
string
